title: Mystery figure at the merch shop
body:
So I just saw on you now can buy a mystery figure in the merch shop for only €15,00 now.
I want to buy two mystery figures (€30,00) but I was wondering : can I get the same figure twice ?
because then I would only buy 1 and not take the risk of getting twice the same figure...
Also this is a other small question : what are the shipping costs ? :D (I live in the Netherlands if you need that ^-^)

Thanks in advance,

**facehammer**

replies.body:
Hey facehammer,

We actually make an effort to not to have duplicate figures in the same order, but this isn't 100% guaranteed.  Shipping is dependent on your address of course, but all our packages for addresses in Europe ship out of Germany if that helps.  We subsidize shipping for most countries and I don't _think_ there's anything different for Netherlands so it should just be 5 Euros for flat rate shipping to Netherlands assuming you're only ordering the two mystery figures (adding more stuff may increase the shipping price).

Keep in mind though that if there are any special customs requirements or charges for your country, we legally have to declare the full value of the figures and not the mystery price, which is 25 Euros per figure, to the customs office.

Hope this helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Zephyreal,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5j3AEnqq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-13T20:43:41.870+0000)
>
> Hey facehammer,
> 
> We actually make an effort to not to have duplicate figures in the same order, but this isn't 100% guaranteed.  Shipping is dependent on your address of course, but all our packages for addresses in Europe ship out of Germany if that helps.  We subsidize shipping for most countries and I don't _think_ there's anything different for Netherlands so it should just be 5 Euros for flat rate shipping to Netherlands assuming you're only ordering the two mystery figures (adding more stuff may increase the shipping price).
> 
> Keep in mind though that if there are any special customs requirements or charges for your country, we legally have to declare the full value of the figures and not the mystery price, which is 25 Euros per figure, to the customs office.
> 
> Hope this helps!

I really thank you for all the information !! I need to say : the Riot support is always amazing !
O and I just rembered : you are the Guy that helpen me whit the tickets for lcs eu Rotterdam !! :D
I really thank you again for helping me then, i don't care it didn't word out,  because you did everthing you could and i really appreciate that .
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Ah yeah I remember that too.  Super bummed we couldn't help you out at the very end, but thanks for being so patient with us through the week
No need to be sad, you do your job excellent !{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
